alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued November 29 at 10:00PM MST until December 03 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Boise
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ THURSDAY TO 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches. For the Winter Storm Watch, heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches, except 4 to 7 inches over the mountains possible. Winds could gust as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southwest Idaho and southeast Oregon. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 5 PM MST /4 PM PST/ Thursday to 11 AM MST /10 AM PST/ Friday. For the Winter Storm Watch, from Friday morning through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Southern Twin Falls County; Southwest Highlands; Western Magic Valley
